text: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَيُونُسَ وَلُوطٗاۚ وَكُلّٗا فَضَّلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

translation.en: And Ishmael and Elisha and Jonah and Lot - and all [of them] We preferred over the worlds
translation.id: Dan Ismail, Alyasa', Yunus dan Lut. Masing-masing Kami lebihkan (derajatnya) di atas umat lain (pada masanya)
